Blog.post: Hey ya'll! wazzup? n2mh. well i had the funnest day 2 day. i went 2 the pool w/dillion, lauren, and danielle. lauren kept sayin *awww they're flirtin!* i waz like -_- we all wonder why lauren...boy sumtimes she can b such a blonde...^_^ u kno wat i mean britt. yea dillion and i started to rap 2gether. ^.^ u kno the song "slow motion" by cashmoney? thats wat we started to rap. lol it waz quite...interesting. well *kisses and hugs* luvya all! TTYL TTFN brokengurl
heya! well for this post, u can just let out ur heart about problems, or watever u wanna share.
Well the title sorta explains itself, so what do u think u are and why? And if u can;t decide, then just say ur a half breed. angel/demon. so have fun! bu baiiz!

All i ever wanted was to be a part of your heart, And for us to be together, never apart No one else in the world can even compare, You're perfect and so is this love that we share. We have so much more than I ever thought we would, I love you more than I ever thought I could. I promise to give you all I have to give, I'll do anything for you as long as I live. In your eyes I see our present, our future and past, By the way you look at me I know we will last. I hope that one day you'll come to realize, How perfect you are when seen through my eyes. - Ashley Borden - Don't u just luv that poem? I do...i dunno if i can relate to that YET but newayz...post ur comments on it if u want. Have fun!
It's time to go Oh say it aint so but sadly its true just plz dont be blu ill c u next month when im tanned by the sun kisses goodbye its my sweet lullaby well im leavin 2morrow!
heya sweeties, wazzup? n2mh! well im leavin tuesday at 9:15am! >brokengurl13 >^

Love easily breaks A heart once whole, Love easily takes A happy soul And once it rips my heart apart Sewing of stitches gingerly start To heal a scarred and roughed up heart So tattered and torn by every thorn And finally when the day is done And when the moon has hid the sun I toss and turn within my bed The voices echo in my head I see his face surrounding me "Stop haunting me!" I scream and pleed He shakes his and sneers at me "Not til you say the magic please!" I say a please; he laughs coldly "I'll never leave!" he taunts at me So then I punch his pretty face I look at his ruins with distaste I spit and say, "You were such a waste." Then dawn breaks thru the silent dark A cheerful song brought by a lark I wake up very drowsily And make my bed so groggily The sun sheds light into my day A smile slowly plays across my face I sigh with relief and throw my arms out An angel holds me and with no doubts He takes me to a better place where smiles are always on my face >brokengurl13 > I made that one up last nite and it took me from 9 - 11pm to come up w/this..but i think its pretty good. well plz post ur comments!

heya sweeties! YAY im back from hawaii! lol i saw my friend named kirby that i hadnt seen in a LONG time! lol hes pretty hot. dont worry im not cheatin on dillion. i went 2 his football practice...but i didnt get a hi even! -_- o well he waz hangin out w/his homies. thats how most guyz r, but even iggie came over and said hi. o well boyz can b so konfusing. soooo im about 3 shades darker than usual now...and im reluctant 2 go back 2 skul. o well i g2g luvya alls lots! mwah! malia
hey peps i just thought id let yall know everything on my page i wrote. someone aske me that so i just thought id tell everyone. thats all for now. later d dub

hey everyone i cant sleep. its like 5:15 in the morning but im bored so here is another poem. o i dont have a title for it read it n tell me what yall think it could be other girls look at me like me n wanna get with me but luckley for u im not that way.ur all i think about night n day lets stay together for ever what do ya say. no one has ever been able to keep my eyes from straying heres what im saying my love for u will never go away at least not untill im old n gray or mabe my dying day. your one of the few that i say this to i love u n its true if only it was really like that. i mean if reality was like that life wouldnt be so bad. but thats like a dream or something. talk to u peps later. d dub

ok i know guys can be that way too. i didnt mean every girl is like that just some. anyway im really bored im just settin here listening to limp bizkit. n talkin to people. well i dont feel like writing another poem song thing so ill talk to u peps later. anything yall wanna say just say it. im out. d dub

i go to parties ya its nice do what ever i want mabe soot some dice drink some beer get drunk n fight hit on the girls u can be their world but dont believe what they say cuz i hear the same thing evey day they say that they love me n they think that im hot but their full of crap they really just want what i got dont be played by a girl she'll take everything ur worth ur money ur car n may even give birth to a baby thats not really even urs but u go along with it not knowing ur being played untill one day u realize that there is no way. thats why i say be the player not the played
hey im not doing anything stupid. the poem said i wasnt gonna do it. u still might have to kick my but though.lol. good luck.lol. man yall dont have to worry. untill next time. luv yall. d dub

life sux. u all know what i mean. but i keep my head up n believe cuz if i dont im just a lost soul waitin to be put in a whole. what is life why am i here i dont know but i need to put down the beer. im waiting for the answer which i probably wont ever get but ill keep on going i wont end it cuz its life. its mine and ill be here untill its my time

hey everyone i know its been a long time ive been kinda busy. ill make another poem here pretty soon mabe itll be more to yalls likings. ill try to make it not sad.k.lol. well i dont have time to do it right now so mabe n the next couple days i will. umm write nething u want. tell me how u all r doing n stuff.k. bye bye for now d dub

I pull the knife out n the blood runs through my hands. I cant believe I did it I didn't even say bye to my friends. this was what I wanted, but now I'm not so shure. its to late though there is no cure. I'm starting to get cold, n my body begins to shake. someone is beside me screaming, but the words I cant make. then everything stops. my eyes roll back, n I feel like I'm falling. flames r swallowing me. There everywhere. the smell of my burning skin I cant bare. this is what ill be. burning for all eternity. becuz of a mistake I made with a knife. that ended my life. ya its a lil different.lol. give me some comments. idk just say nething.lol. well sorry its been so long I've been kinda busy n this computer is really slow. Well I'm gonna go for now. Later d dub

Its been 39 hours sense the last time I slept I feel like crap n my cloths r unkept but I don't care right now all I have to do it urn this bottle upside down it'll take away everything all my thoughts n all my pain it'll take away everything all my memories n all my shame this is want I want I know it must be true I wanna forget about u n forget about what u put me trough as I put the bottom of this bottle up high I toast to a lie the next thing I know I'm in the emergency room she's setting next to me n says I love u all I can get out is I love u too but my breath cuts short n my eyes begin to close she squeezes my hand tight n says don't give up without a fight but my eyes close as I see a bright light. well its kinda sad. Hey if yall can come up with a better title tell me. I'm not very good at coming up with them. O ya brokengurl13 if u check this. Invite me again cuz the one u sent me didn't work.k. well I g2g. lata d dub

hey peps i have what i think is a good poem. but i dont have time to put it on my page. cuz im leaving i g2g outa town. ill be back in on mon. or tuesday. i dont think ill be able to get back on till then so the poem will just have to wait.lol. but i have it writen. n next time i get on ill put it on. o ya n case u were wondering i now have been awake for 38 hours with no sleep. man that sounds like a lot.lol. later for now.d dub.

whats up my friends.lol. ok i must have a sleeping problem or something cuz its 8:15 am n i havent gone to sleep yet. o well maybe i will tonight. my normal hours that i sleep r from 6 am to 9am. but i just didnt go to sleep last night. anyway how have yall been. ive been ok except i cant sleep!!! i dont really have nething to say just thought id write something cuz im bored. so if yall wanna say nething just write away.lol. well thats all for now. till next time. d dub

I thought I left u I thought I put u behind now u show back u n ur back on my mind why do u do this to me why cant u just let us be u keep bringing up the past what we had is over nothing ever lasts get that though ur head n get out of mine cuz I cant do it this time its to hard Im loosing my grip I try to hold on but I cant im gonna slip ill mess up like I always do n ur pretending like u have no clue but u know its true u want to be my friend but when i see u with him my fists start to clench cant u take a hint everytime we talk I get closer to loosing my grip I try to hold on but I cant im gonna slip u make it to hard I don't need another scare just let me be n if its meant to be n the future we will see
